## common.composeAsync() function

从右到左组合多个异步函数

返回一个新的异步函数，该函数是从右到左执行传入的所有函数的组合

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function composeAsync<T = any, R = any>(...fns: Array<(arg: any) => any | Promise<any>>): (arg: T) => Promise<R>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

fns


</td><td>

Array&lt;(arg: any) =&gt; any \| Promise&lt;any&gt;&gt;


</td><td>

要组合的异步函数列表


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

(arg: T) =&gt; Promise&lt;R&gt;

组合后的异步函数

## Remarks

版本: 1.0.0 分类: 函数组合

## Example


```typescript
// 组合多个异步函数
const fetchUser = async id => await api.getUser(id);
const getPermissions = async user => await api.getPermissions(user.id);
const formatData = async permissions => permissions.map(p => p.name);

// 从右到左执行: fetchUser -> getPermissions -> formatData
const getUserPermissions = composeAsync(formatData, getPermissions, fetchUser);
const permissions = await getUserPermissions(123); // ['read', 'write', ...]
```
